name: network_map
description: Wallet Network Map via Nansen. Shows funding relationships, deployer connections, and multisig links. Returns wallet labels, relation type, chain, and transaction hash.

requirement.wallet_address: 0x address to map related wallets for
requirement.chain: Blockchain to query (optional, default: ethereum). Valid: arbitrum, avalanche, base, bnb, ethereum, polygon, solana, etc.
